group_1.textLeft: That is correct, Yukika.
In short, at that time...
You're caught up in a revision to the world that@occurred in the near future.
Let me explain what happened.

group_1.narration: "As I have said before,@Kamihama City is surrounded by a special barrier."
"As such, we could not enter the barrier@and directly interfere with the city."

group_1.textLeft: Not long ago, we didn’t even know what was@happening inside of the barrier.

group_1.textRight: ...But this time, you were lucky enough to get in.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I then began testing what I could do.
So I made a contract with a girl who desperately@wanted a miracle.

group_1.textRight: On the day of the Moon-Viewing, she met@Kyubey instead of a rabbit.

group_1.textLeft: On the contrary, your Magical Girl form is far@more reminiscent of a rabbit.
I signed a contract with a girl named “Rion Yuzuki”.
That's right, the twin sister of the Magical Girl@Hotori Yuzuki.
What’s wrong?

group_1.textRight: (So “Hotorin” was just a silly nickname...@Sorry, Hotori...)

group_1.textLeft: ...Hotori Yuzuki was on the verge of death@fighting this Witch.

group_1.narration: "She said that she found a Labyrinth@inside of the school building."
"The Witch was too formidable of a foe for her,@but with a strong sense of justice,@she faced it all alone."
"Following closely behind,@her younger sister, Rion Yuzuki,@also entered the Labyrinth."
"Rion Yuzuki, who was not yet a Magical Girl.@And Hotori Yuzuki, who had neither the power@nor the experience to both fight and defend her."
"In their moment of desperation,@a Magical Girl dressed in white robes,@one who you girls call a 'White Feather', saved them."

group_1.textRight: I see... So it was Miss Akatsuki, wasn’t it?
She quickly noticed the anomaly and headed to@the Witch’s Labyrinth...

group_1.textLeft: Do you mean Tsukuyo Akatsuki? No, it wasn’t her.
She wasn’t at school at the time.

group_1.textRight: (Even in this world, Miss Akatsuki left early...)
Are there other White Feathers who attend@this school?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, there is one... Or perhaps I should say that@there was one?
She then let the twins escape the Labyrinth and@fought the Witch alone.
But she lost her life when her Soul Gem was@shattered.

group_1.narration: "The Witch residing in this Labyrinth was@stronger than what she could handle."
"The Witch's blow that killed her@was so powerful that it caused@the building outside to collapse..."
"Hotori Yuzuki protected her sister from@the collapsing building, but ended up@suffering from fatal wounds that even@her magic couldn’t keep up with."
"That was the moment that@Rion Yuzuki encountered me."

group_1.textLeft: Exactly. She made her wish to me, and twisted@reality itself.
Via her powerful desire to reject the reality@before her eyes.
The contract was executed without any issues.
And as a result...
Reality was rewritten from what you call@'World A' into the altered 'World B'.

group_1.textRight: A world where the accident doesn’t happen@in the old school building?

group_1.textLeft: Yes.
Strictly speaking, the moment the building@collapsed has already happened...
But here the accident has yet to occur.
So from your perspective, when you were@standing in the arcade...
You were 'caught in a world revision that would@occur in the future'.
In other words, due to fate being warped by@Rion Yuzuki's wish...
Time and reality were rewritten to eliminate the@possibility of the accident.
